name: The Flip Side (CrazyGamingGuy)
description:
This is my submission to the GeoJam 2022! The theme is: Pick a Side!

In this game, you must jump from platform to platform, matching it up with the colour you land on. 

Use the left and right mouse buttons to rotate, A and D to move horizontally, and Space to jump. 

There are achievements, so see if you can unlock them all!

Enjoy!
